016package io.micronaut.maven.jib;
017
018import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.buildplan.*;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.buildplan.UnixPathParser;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.JibMavenPluginExtension;
021import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.MavenData;
022import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.plugins.extension.ExtensionLogger;
023import io.micronaut.core.util.StringUtils;
024import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
025import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
026import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
027
028import java.util.*;
029
030/**
031 * Jib extension to support building Docker images.
032 *
033 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
034 * @since 1.1
035 */
036public class JibMicronautExtension implements JibMavenPluginExtension<Void> {
037
038    public static final String DEFAULT_JAVA17_BASE_IMAGE = "eclipse-temurin:17-jre";
039    public static final String DEFAULT_JAVA21_BASE_IMAGE = "eclipse-temurin:21-jre";
040    private static final String LATEST_TAG = "latest";
041    private static final String JDK_VERSION = "maven.compiler.target";
042
043    @Override
044    public Optional<Class<Void>> getExtraConfigType() {
045        return Optional.empty();
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public ContainerBuildPlan extendContainerBuildPlan(ContainerBuildPlan buildPlan, Map<String, String> properties,
050                                                       Optional<Void> extraConfig, MavenData mavenData,
051                                                       ExtensionLogger logger) {
052
053        ContainerBuildPlan.Builder builder = buildPlan.toBuilder();
054        MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(mavenData.getMavenProject().getProperties().getProperty(MicronautRuntime.PROPERTY, "none").toUpperCase());
055
056        JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService = new JibConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
057
058        String baseImage = buildPlan.getBaseImage();
059        if (StringUtils.isEmpty(buildPlan.getBaseImage())) {
060            baseImage = determineBaseImage(getJdkVersion(mavenData.getMavenProject()));
061            builder.setBaseImage(baseImage);
062        }
063        logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Using base image: " + baseImage);
064
065        ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService = new ApplicationConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
066        try {
067            int port = Integer.parseInt(applicationConfigurationService.getServerPort());
068            if (port > 0) {
069                logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Exposing port: " + port);
070                builder.addExposedPort(Port.tcp(port));
071            }
072        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
073            // ignore, can't automatically expose port
074            logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Dynamically resolved port present. Ensure the port is correctly exposed in the <container> configuration. See https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/tree/master/jib-maven-plugin#example for an example.");
075        }
076
077        builder.setPlatforms(Set.of(detectPlatform()));
078
079        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
080            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
081                List<? extends LayerObject> originalLayers = buildPlan.getLayers();
082                builder.setLayers(originalLayers.stream().map(JibMicronautExtension::remapLayer).toList());
083                List<String> cmd = jibConfigurationService.getArgs();
084                if (cmd.isEmpty()) {
085                    cmd = Collections.singletonList("io.micronaut.oraclecloud.function.http.HttpFunction::handleRequest");
086                }
087                String projectFnVersion = determineProjectFnVersion(System.getProperty("java.version"));
088                builder.setBaseImage("fnproject/fn-java-fdk:" + projectFnVersion)
089                        .setWorkingDirectory(AbsoluteUnixPath.get(jibConfigurationService.getWorkingDirectory().orElse("/function")))
090                        .setEntrypoint(buildProjectFnEntrypoint())
091                        .setCmd(cmd);
092            }
093            case LAMBDA -> {
094                List<String> entrypoint = buildPlan.getEntrypoint();
095                Objects.requireNonNull(entrypoint).set(entrypoint.size() - 1, "io.micronaut.function.aws.runtime.MicronautLambdaRuntime");
096                builder.setEntrypoint(entrypoint);
097            }
098            default -> {
099                //no op
100            }
101        }
102        return builder.build();
103    }
104
105    public static List<String> buildProjectFnEntrypoint() {
106        List<String> entrypoint = new ArrayList<>(9);
107        entrypoint.add("/usr/java/latest/bin/java");
108        entrypoint.add("-XX:-UsePerfData");
109        entrypoint.add("-XX:+UseSerialGC");
110        entrypoint.add("-Xshare:on");
111        entrypoint.add("-Djava.awt.headless=true");
112        entrypoint.add("-Djava.library.path=/function/runtime/lib");
113        entrypoint.add("-cp");
114        entrypoint.add("/function/app/classes:/function/app/libs/*:/function/app/resources:/function/runtime/*");
115        entrypoint.add("com.fnproject.fn.runtime.EntryPoint");
116        return entrypoint;
117    }
118
119    public static String determineProjectFnVersion(String javaVersion) {
120        int majorVersion = Integer.parseInt(javaVersion.split("\\.")[0]);
121        if (majorVersion >= 17) {
122            return "jre17-latest";
123        } else {
124            return LATEST_TAG;
125        }
126    }
127
128    public static String determineBaseImage(String jdkVersion) {
129        int javaVersion = Integer.parseInt(jdkVersion);
130        return javaVersion == 17 ? DEFAULT_JAVA17_BASE_IMAGE : DEFAULT_JAVA21_BASE_IMAGE;
131    }
132
133    public static String getJdkVersion(MavenProject project) {
134        return System.getProperty(JDK_VERSION, project.getProperties().getProperty(JDK_VERSION));
135    }
136
137    static LayerObject remapLayer(LayerObject layerObject) {
138        FileEntriesLayer originalLayer = (FileEntriesLayer) layerObject;
139        FileEntriesLayer.Builder builder = FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName(originalLayer.getName());
140        for (FileEntry originalEntry : originalLayer.getEntries()) {
141            builder.addEntry(remapEntry(originalEntry, layerObject.getName()));
142        }
143
144        return builder.build();
145    }
146
147    static FileEntry remapEntry(FileEntry originalEntry, String layerName) {
148        List<String> pathComponents = UnixPathParser.parse(originalEntry.getExtractionPath().toString());
149        AbsoluteUnixPath newPath;
150        if (layerName.contains("dependencies")) {
151            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function/app/libs/" + pathComponents.get(pathComponents.size() - 1));
152        } else {
153            //classes or resources
154            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function" + originalEntry.getExtractionPath());
155        }
156
157        return new FileEntry(originalEntry.getSourceFile(), newPath, originalEntry.getPermissions(),
158                originalEntry.getModificationTime(), originalEntry.getOwnership());
159    }
160
161    private Platform detectPlatform() {
162        String arch = System.getProperty("os.arch").equals("aarch64") ? "arm64" : "amd64";
163        return new Platform(arch, "linux");
164    }
165
166}
